byline.contributor: Carlotta Gall contributed reporting from Tunis.

abstract: British Prime Min David Cameron signals that Britain may join United States bombing of Islamic State in Syria.
lead_paragraph: Britain is already part of operations in Iraq, but a spokeswoman for Prime Minister David Cameron said he wants Parliament to consider authorizing Britain to do “more in Syria.”

headline.main: Britain Hints It May Join U.S. Campaign Against ISIS in Syria
headline.print_headline: Cameron Hints That Britain May Join U.S. Bombing of ISIS in Syria

snippet: Britain is already part of operations in Iraq, but a spokeswoman for Prime Minister David Cameron said he wants Parliament to consider authorizing Britain to do “more in Syria.”

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
